bilingual.source: The clock is powered by a mechanical spring.
bilingual.target: 这钟是由机械的发条驱动的。
她在大学学习机械的工程。

bilingual.source: The robot moved in a mechanical, lifeless manner.
bilingual.target: 机器人以机械的、无生命的方式移动。

bilingual.source: He has a mechanical approach to solving problems.
bilingual.target: 他解决问题的方法非常机械的。

bilingual.source: The factory uses mechanical arms to assemble the cars.
bilingual.target: 工厂使用机械的手臂来组装汽车。

bilingual.source: The mechanical noise from the construction site was very loud.
bilingual.target: 建筑工地传来的机械的噪音非常大。

bilingual.source: It can be either mechanical or electronic.
bilingual.target: 它既能是机械的也能是电子的。
随着机械的最大压力调整.

bilingual.source: This represents a mechanical way of thinking.
Rattled off the facts in a dry mechanical tone.
bilingual.target: 用冷漠而机械的声调一口气说完事实

yingyinNormal.en: By most mechanical and dirty hand, I shall have such revenges on you both.
yingyinNormal.zh: 以肮脏龌龊的匠人之手，我必对你们痛加报复。——莎士比亚《亨利四世》

yingyinNormal.en: We were once a peaceful race of intelligent mechanical beings, but then came the war.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们曾是一群崇尚和平的智能机器人，但是却发生了战争。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. The ride broke down. So, Carol and I went behind a couple of those mechanical Dutch children.
yingyinNormal.zh: 机器故障，所以我和卡萝就到荷兰儿童机器人后面。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm trying to get our grant proposal together. Any chance you've finished up those mechanical drawings?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想要把我们的拨款提案给写完。你把那些机械制图弄完了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Good for you, sweetie. Ok, next question. What is the quantum mechanical effect used to encode data on hard-disk drives? Howard?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真棒，亲爱的。好了，下个问题，何种量子力学效应被应用在硬盘存储加密上？霍华德。

yingyinNormal.en: The fundamental problem with elementary quantum mechanical formalism is that the Fourier transform extends to minus infinity in time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而基础量子力学理论它的根本问题就是傅里叶变换将会渐渐趋于负无穷。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, Sheldon. You can't turn your back on physics. Besides, you have no idea what you're doing with this stuff. But if you really want to learn the mechanical side, I can teach you anything you want to know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，谢尔顿，你不能就这样放弃物理。而且你根本不知道你在捣鼓什么。如果你真想学机械方面的知识，你想知道的，我都能教你。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: He is a teacher at a school where learning is not something of books and tests and <highlight>mechanical</highlight> memorization, but practical.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是一所学校的老师，在那里学习不是书本、考试和机械记忆，而是实践。

examination_example.sentence: The foundation has as its flagship project a <highlight>mechanical</highlight> clock .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该基金会的旗舰项目是一个机械钟。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Having fewer parts makes the electric car cheaper to maintain and less likely to have <highlight>mechanical</highlight> problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 零部件越少，电动汽车的维护成本就越低，出现机械故障的可能性也就越小。
另一个大问题是机械故障。
